Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Kimball
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to a mechanical problem.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to a mechanical problem. 

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

This may include:
#81 Lawrence
#78 Montrose 
#80 Irving Park

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
